messages.text_startPrePhase: {prefix} <red>A new Boss Raid is happening in {min} minutes!
messages.text_startFightPhase:
{prefix} <color:#ffdc73>The boss revealed itself!
<red>It's {form} {pokemon}! <gray>You have {min} minutes to defeat it!
messages.text_catchEncounterWarning: {prefix} <red>Catch encounters starts in {sec} seconds! Make sure you get to a place that's not crowded!
messages.text_timesUp: {prefix} <red>The boss {form} {pokemon} was not defeated in time!
messages.text_maxPlayersInRaid: {prefix} <red>Currently a max of {maxplayers} are already fighting the Boss! Try in a again in a few seconds.
messages.text_cooldownMessage: {prefix} <red>You are still on the %sec% second cooldown!
messages.text_noPokemonInParty: {prefix} <red>You can't join a raid with no pokemon in your party!
messages.text_raidPokeballOutsideRaid: {prefix} <red>You can't throw raid pokeballs outside of Raids!
messages.text_noRaidPass: {prefix} <red>This raid requires a Raid Pass to join!
messages.text_useRaidPass: {prefix} <green>You redeemed your Raid Pass successfully! You will now be able to join the raid!
messages.text_alreadyUsedRaidPass: {prefix} <red>You already redeemed a Raid Pass for this Raid!
messages.text_noRaidPassNeeded: {prefix} <gray>You don't need a Raid Pass for this raid to participate!
messages.text_useRaidVoucher: {prefix} <green>You redeemed your raid voucher successfully! A raid is starting now.
messages.text_couldNotFindBoss: {prefix} <red>Couldn't find the boss on your Voucher, contact staff!
messages.text_disabledItems: {prefix} <red>You can't use this item during a Raid!</red>
messages.text_denyProjectile: {prefix} <red>You cant throw projectiles during a raid!
messages.text_faintedPokemon: {prefix} <red>You can't start the raid with fainted Pokemon in your party!
messages.text_denyBannedMoves: {prefix} <red>The move {banned_move} is currently not allowed during raids!
messages.text_denyBannedPokemon: {prefix} <red>{banned_pokemon} is currently not allowed during raids!
messages.text_denyBannedHeldItem: {prefix} <red>The held item {banned_item} is currently not allowed during raids!
messages.text_denyBannedAbility: {prefix} <red>The ability {ability} is currently not allowed during raids!
messages.text_denyThrowPokeball: {prefix} <red>You can't throw Pokeballs during a Raid!</red>
messages.text_denyNonRaidPokeball: {prefix} <red>You can only throw the special raid Pokeball during the catch phase!

bossbars.bossbar_catchWarning_text: <red>Catching event starts soon, get to a safe place!
